nodes.text: The Old Trade Federation Route was the trade route used by the Trade Federation before the Invasion of Naboo. It lay within the Enmaekeda Nebula, a tumultuous ball of space matter home to Borvo's thugs. The Imperial Navy claimed the route unsafe and restricted travel to all parties.
After the invasion, the route was no longer used. Some time between 19 BBY and 0 ABY, it was taken over by the Nal Raka Criminal Empire.
